Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton Toronto, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Four Seasons Centre and Campbell House Museum. This 4-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 600 air-conditioned guestrooms. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Satellite programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

With a stay at Hilton Toronto, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Four Seasons Centre and Campbell House Museum. This 4-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Four Seasons Centre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Campbell House Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Osgoode Hall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Alexandra Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Toronto Symphony Orchestra - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Nathan Phillips Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Roy Thomson Hall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Princess of Wales Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Toronto City Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
TIFF Bell Lightbox - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ontario College of Art and Design - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Grange Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Church of the Holy Trinity - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Elgin and Winter Garden Theatres - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Toronto Eaton Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City) - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Toronto is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hilton Toronto are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport) - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Toronto is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
